name: Human Resource Management
description: An introduction to current human resource practices in Canada, emphasizing the role of Human Resource Management in enhancing performance, productivity and profitability of the organization. Topics include recruitment, selection, training, career planning and development, diversity and human rights issues in the work place.
prerequisites: MGHB02H3 or or MGIB02H3 or [(MGTB23H3) and (MGTB29H3)] or (MGTB27Y3)
